name: Neonics
description:
Neonics, the photonic entities from Hexium ,  have set up a base near your home base planet.  They will devour all matter if left unchecked.

 Your mission is to protect your home base and capture Neonics.  You must build a fleet of spaceship in order to guard your planet. Compete with your ally for force shield or battle with real life friends for parts and components.
